dashboard.description:
Monitor your Apache JMeter load test in real time with InfluxDB and Grafana.
Get overall summary, errors details and particular transaction response times.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count" and  r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  =~ /count/ and r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value","_time","_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |>  reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => (
        {count: r.count + accumulator.count, 
         countError: r.countError + accumulator.countError
        }
        ), 
        identity: {count: 0.0, countError: 0.0})
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: ((r.count - r.countError) /  r.count) }))
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "avg")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> mean()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "min")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> min()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> max()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count" and  r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  =~ /count/ and r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value","_time","_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |>  reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => (
        {count: r.count + accumulator.count, 
         countError: r.countError + accumulator.countError
        }
        ), 
        identity: {count: 0.0, countError: 0.0})
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.countError / r.count) }))
    |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rb" and  r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sb" and  r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct99.0")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_time","_value"])
  |> mean()

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "count"  and r["transaction"]  == "all" )
  |> keep(columns: ["application","_time","_value","env","version","users"])

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "maxAT" and r["transaction"] == "internal")
  |> keep(columns: ["application","_time","_value","env","version","users"])

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "count" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"]  != "all" )
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value","_time"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "avg" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> mean()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "avg"})
  |> group()

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "min" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> min()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "min"})

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "max" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> max()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "max"})

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "pct99.0" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "avg pct99"})

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "pct99.0" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> min()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "min pct99"})

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "pct99.0" and r["statut"]  == "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> max()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "max pct99"})

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "sb" and r["statut"] != "all" and r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "sent"})

from(bucket: "mighty-meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "statistics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"]  == "rb" and r["statut"] != "all" )
  |> keep(columns: ["transaction","_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "received"})

dashboard.title: REALTIME
